name: Best Bite Shawarma
text:
Salads
Lebanese House: Small $6.99, Large $11.99 Romaine lettuce, cucumber, green onion, and tomato, tossed in a garlic lemon dressing.

Fattoush: Small $6.99, Large $11.99 Romaine lettuce, parsley, green onion, cucumber, green peppers, red cabbage, and tomato; tossed in a garlic lemon vinaigrette dressing. Served with fried pita chips.

Tabbouleh: Small $6.99, Large $11.99 Fresh chopped parsley, green onion, tomato, and crushed wheat; tossed in a lemon dressing.

Malfouf: Small $5.99, Large $9.99 Shredded red and green cabbage; tossed in a garlic lemon and mint dressing.

Dips
Hummus: Small $6.99, Large $11.99 Hummus/chickpea blend with garlic, lemon juice, and tahini.

Baba Ghanouj: Small $6.99, Large $11.99 Baba Ghanouj/eggplant blend with garlic, lemon juice, and tahini.

Garlic Dip: $6.99

Trator: $6.99

Sides
Chicken or Beef Shawarma: Small $4.99, Large $6.00 ADD to any salad or dip.

Rice: Small $4.99, Large $7.99 Traditional Lebanese rice made with Basmati rice and fried vermicelli noodles.

Canadian Inspired
Fresh Cut Fries: Small $3.85, Medium $4.80, Large $6.40

Potato Wedges: Small $4.25, Medium $5.50, Large $7.50

Mozza Poutine: Small $4.55, Medium $5.65, Large $7.99

Mozza Sticks (6): $6.99

Onion Rings: $5.65

Chicken Strips (4): $6.99

Cheese Burger: $5.99

Pastries
Baklawa: $2.25 Cashew or Pistachio.

Namoura: $1.99

Date Mamoul: $1.99

Appetizers
Foul Moudammas: $6.99 Cooked and lightly mashed fava beans tossed in a garlic and lemon sauce.

Makdous (4): $6.99 Pickled baby eggplant, stuffed with walnuts, red pepper, and garlic.

Warak Arish (10): $7.99 Rolled grape leaves stuffed with rice, parsley, green onion, tomato, and mint; cooked in a lemon and olive oil sauce.

Falafel (4): $5.99 Ground chickpeas and fava beans; seasoned with parsley, cilantro, onion, garlic, and a variety of spices.

Kibbeh (4): $9.99 Ground beef meat shell with crushed wheat; stuffed with onion, meat, and a variety of spices.

Lebanese Chicken Wings (12): $14.99 Fresh wings tossed in a garlic, cilantro, and lemon sauce.

Deep Fried Cauliflower (8): $6.99 Fried cauliflower served with a side of tahini sauce.

Spinach Fatire (4): $6.99 Baked spinach triangles with handmade dough and filled with spinach, onion, and lemon stuffing.

Sfiha (4): $6.99 Baked meat pie squares with handmade dough and filled with ground beef, tomato, onion, and a variety of spices.

Pita Wraps
Chicken Shawarma: $9.49 Marinated chicken with lettuce, tomato, pickle, and garlic.

Beef Shawarma: $9.99 Marinated beef with lettuce, tomato, pickle, onion, and tartar.

Kafta: $9.99 Grilled ground beef made with onion, parsley, and spices; filled with lettuce, tomato, pickle, and onion.

Falafel: $8.99 Falafel filled with fresh mint, parsley, tomato, pickled turnips, and tartar.

Hummus: $7.99 Hummus filled with tomato and pickles.

Dinner Plates
Chicken Shawarma: $17.99 Served with fries, hummus, garlic dip, tomato, and pickle.

Beef Shawarma: $18.99 Served with fries, hummus, tartar, tomato, pickle, and onion.

Kafta: $18.99 Served with hummus, pickle, and grilled tomato & onion.

Falafel: $15.99 Six fried falafel served with hummus, tartar, tomato, pickled turnips, and fresh parsley.

Lentil Soup: $5.99

Rice Bowl: $13.99 Chicken or Beef Shawarma.
